description: Win the family over with these chicken schnitzel burgers; a scrumptiously easy midweek meal.
keywords: Chicken burger,Quick & easy dinner,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Quick & easy lunch,Dinner Made Easy,Chicken
name: Fast Chicken Schnitzel Burgers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: Masterfoods Chipotle Taco Style Sauce (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Drizzle chicken with 1 tbs olive oil and rub each to coat. Place schnitzel mix in a shallow bowl, add chicken and toss to coat.

Heat another 1 tbs oil in a large saucepan on medium heat. Add 1 schnitzel and cook for 3 minutes each side or until golden brown and cooked through. Set aside on a plate lined with paper towel. Repeat with remaining olive oil and schnitzels.
Halve schnitzels and place on cut-side of rolls. Top with chipotle sauce and sandwich with roll tops.
